column1: La Roda is a small city located in the Province of Albacete in the autonomous community of Castile-La Mancha in Spain.
The town has a population of around 16
column2: 500 people. It is an important industrial town. Its most famous building is the church which dates from the 15th century.

column1: Its main culinary speciality are the Miguelitos. Tennis player Guillermo García López hails and David Castro triathlon runner from La Roda.
